name: Chinese inn
description:
"Chinese inn" is a Chinese-style management game.

It was released in 1998. 2017 is back on Steam

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Players must operate the inn.

In the process, you can develop more menus, hire clerks,

And buy all kinds of furniture, to expand the size of the store.

The final goal of the game,

Become the best in the world of Shoppes.
